participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and adventurous, loves discussing pop culture and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: I like to use my tablet to listen to music while I'm getting ready. I am not very good at playing basketball. I wish my dog could come with me on all my travels. I am the only member of my immediate family who is not employed by Sears. I love The Walking Dead.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and nature-loving, enjoys sharing experiences and connecting over common interests.
participant_2.background: I'm afraid of being judged for my diet. My dad works in the automotive industry. I need someone who shares my love of the outdoors. I do not like wearing pants when I do not have to. On weekends I like to go hiking.

content.text: Hi, I'm John! Whats your name?
Hello John, my name is Sarah! How are you today?
I'm doing well thanks for asking! What are you up to today?
Not much just hanging out, what about you?
Same here. I'm a pretty big fan of the walking dead, have you seen it?
Yes! I love that show! I'm on season 7 right now!
Oh nice! I'm on season 8 and I'm really enjoying it.
Me too! I'm really excited to see what happens next!
Me too! I'm also really into hiking and camping. Do you like the outdoors?
Yes! I love the outdoors! I go hiking and camping every weekend!
That's awesome! We should go hiking together sometime!
Yeah that would be fun!
Great! What's your favorite place to hike?
I really like hiking in the mountains.
Me too! I love the views from the top of the mountains.
Yes! The views are amazing!
I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too!
We should exchange numbers so we can plan a hiking trip.
That's a great idea!
Here's my number: (123)456-7890
Thanks! Here's mine: (098)765-4321
Great! I'll text you later so we can plan a hike.
Sounds good!
